name: Truth-Polarity Bridge Axiom
statement: For any Θ-annotated proposition x with truth value Π(x) and polarity Θ(x), the pair (Π(x), Θ(x)) must satisfy the bridge relation B unless a contradiction/negation witness is explicitly present.
constraints: Bridge relation B encodes the admissible (Π, Θ) pairs.
Witness nodes include NOT gates, explicit contradiction markers, or higher-level Ω constraints.
